projectDesc.p: This transcription was made by the Multimedia Yasna Project.

editorialDecl.p: This transcription was made using the MUYA OTE.

ab.note: Correct order of this and precending word reversed in ms. This seems to be indicated with diacritics that look like number 1 above both words.
